## TxBuilder.addDelegation() method

Adds a certificate to delegate a staker to a pool

**Signature:**

```typescript
addDelegation(delegator: Credential, poolId: PoolId, redeemer?: PlutusData): TxBuilder;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

delegator


</td><td>

Credential


</td><td>

The credential of the staker to delegate.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

poolId


</td><td>

PoolId


</td><td>

The ID of the pool to delegate to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

redeemer


</td><td>

PlutusData


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional. A redeemer to be used if the delegation requires Plutus script validation.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[TxBuilder](./tx.txbuilder.md)

{<!-- -->TxBuilder<!-- -->} The updated transaction builder.
